data.title: Lightning Strikes Twice
data.meta_description: Two warm and funny stories in one book. Lightning Fred Digby is determined to win a race at sports day but everyone knows he’s the slowest runner in the school. What they don’t know is that Digby has a tortoise called Fred, the fastest tortoise in the world. Can he help Digby win the race? […]
data.text:
Anthologies

Books for Young Readers

Collections

Two warm and funny stories in one book.

Lightning Fred

Digby is determined to win a race at sports day but everyone knows he’s the slowest runner in the school. What they don’t know is that Digby has a tortoise called Fred, the fastest tortoise in the world. Can he help Digby win the race?

YOB

When Joanna finds a large black dog lying unconscious in the road, she doesn’t realise what chaos he is going to cause at home. Everything turns topsy-turvy when Yob’s around – and when a burglar breaks in at dead of night, he gets a nasty surprise.
